name: CodeDefuse 2.0
description:
The bomb has been activated with a secret code, all you know is that the numbers go from 1 to 5 and can be repeated several times.

In order to defuse it tap the screen to enter the code with contiguous taps and the bomb displays the number of times you tapped at a given time.
Solve the code before the time runs out or it will blow the entire city.

Welcome to CODEDEFUSE 2.0, THE MENACE RETURNS!
